title: PES Bus Facility
content: How's the bus facility? The app says the seating capacity is 50-52 but idts everyone will get to sit, will i have to stand? Is gonna be really crammed?

comments.body:
Instead of another post
Will bus' be vacant till kcet second extended round gets over??

It’s good. They only book to fill the seats so idt you’ll have to stand, but when the bus goes by the Mysore metro station all the pes kids coming from metro get on the bus, so it gets really cramped for like 3 minutes. You should be sitting by then tho. Make sure to note the drivers name and number so you can call him if you ever miss the bus and check where the next stop is.
Depends on the route, if it’s a popular one probably not but worth checking anyways, it’s first come first serve.
Route 1 to rr is that a popular one?
Does anyone travel from Electronic City to RR campus everyday?
Does anyone travel from Electronic City to RR campus everyday and how tiring that would be.
